citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:15 PM on
20-Apr-17.
Knocked on door. Called her phone and waited 30 minutes with no response.
